body_html:
@apaszke, for easy and automatic stacking of arbitrary models we can add some description of inputs and outputs to Module class, so it will be possible to explicitly read what an RNN eats and how many states it requires
The only thing is that it's probably too premature

The only thing is that it's probably too premature
body:
@apaszke, for easy and automatic stacking of arbitrary models we can add some description of inputs and outputs to `Module` class, so it will be possible to explicitly read what an RNN eats and how many states it requires
The only thing is that it's probably too premature
